cause.description:
Remember John Lennon's words as he sang the amazing song "Imagine". His influence upon the world, his ways of seeing things as everything being equal and rightious!! No religion, no heaven, no hell, no countries or states, the world united completely as one!! Its also in memory of him, help us remember his beliefs and he will never truly die as long as we keep him close to our hearts.
All the money donated will be given to the "Institute for Multi-Track Diplomacy" which in its way also follows John Lenon's view of achieving World Peace.
The Website of the organization is the following: http://www.imtd.org/
Please Join, and make the World a Peaceful one for our youth and the generations to come.
1. Promote Peace & Unity
2. Spread love and friendship among others
3. Honor the death & memory of John Lennon
cause.mission: Bring the World Together as One
cause.name: Honoring John Lennon
